DOC.brief_summary: This step wedge , randomize control trial test effectiveness Supported Self-Management intervention depression among adult Vietnam . The intervention deliver community level 8 Vietnamese province primary care provider social worker . The intervention group receive Supported Self-Management intervention , control group receive enhance treatment usual . The primary outcome measure depression Self-Reporting Questionnaire-20 ( SRQ-20 ) . The World Health Organization 's Disability Assessment Scale ( WHODAS 2.00 CAGE ( Concern/Cut-down , Anger , Guilt , Eye-opener ) measure also use assess functional ability alcohol misuse .
